user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I want to add some humor to the proceedings. Fetch me a random joke from the Jokes by API-Ninjas and a random Chuck Norris joke. Additionally, provide me with a list of available joke categories to explore more options.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random joke from the Jokes by API-Ninjas.
Fetch a random Chuck Norris joke.
Retrieve a list of available joke categories from the Jokes by API-Ninjas.
